title: Fix inspector selection and expose system editor
description: Make object row clicks focus inspector selection, add System Settings entry, and normalize stored nodes for missing render fields.
close_reason: Updated Objects tree selection behavior, added System Settings button, normalized node defaults; tests: npm run test:unit.

title: Fix inspector content collapse with flex sizing
description: Adjust inspector content flex sizing so selection details remain visible even when container height is auto.
close_reason: Adjusted inspector content flex sizing to avoid collapse; tests: npm run test:unit.

title: Add Rust cache to web CI
description: Add Swatinem/rust-cache to web-tests workflow to speed wasm build.
close_reason: Added rust-cache step to web-tests; tests: npm test (web).

title: Web UI: render bifurcation diagrams for continuation branches
description: Implement bifurcation diagram rendering in the web UI once continuation branches are available. Use selected branch data to plot parameter vs state/eigenvalue metrics and surface configuration controls.
acceptance_criteria:
- Bifurcation diagram panels render data from selected branches.
- Diagram configuration (x/y parameters) is respected.
- Empty-state messaging remains for unassigned branches.
close_reason: Implemented Plotly bifurcation diagram rendering with axis/branch selection and empty-state messaging in rewrite web UI.

title: Mock localStorage in tests to avoid Node warning
description: Add a deterministic in-memory localStorage mock in web test setup to silence Node webstorage warning.
close_reason: Added localStorage mock in web/src/test/setup.ts; tests: npm run test:unit.

title: Web lint: resolve setState-in-effect warning in ViewportPanel
description: ESLint fails on react-hooks/set-state-in-effect in web/src/ui/ViewportPanel.tsx around the scene id effect. Fix or refactor to satisfy lint.
close_reason: Resolved by refactoring ViewportPanel time-series state handling to avoid setState in effect; lint now passes.

title: Configure web CI to build WASM before tests
description: Ensure web-tests workflow installs Rust + wasm-pack and builds pkg-web before running npm test.
close_reason: Implemented CI wasm build + updated tracker; tests: npm test (web).

title: Web lint: eliminate explicit any in PlotlyViewport
description: ESLint no-explicit-any errors in web/src/viewports/plotly/PlotlyViewport.tsx for Plotly event types. Provide concrete types or safe aliases.
close_reason: Resolved by typing Plotly event handlers in PlotlyViewport; no explicit any remains.

title: Web UI: add codim-1 continuations from equilibrium branch points (Hopf/Fold)
description: Add CLI-parity point actions for equilibrium branches in the web UI to continue Hopf/Fold curves (2-parameter codim-1 continuations). Wire ForkCoreClient/worker/WASM calls, persist branches with correct branchType metadata, and surface UI actions from branch point details.
acceptance_criteria:
- From an equilibrium branch point marked Hopf/Fold, the web UI can start the corresponding codim-1 continuation.
- New branches persist with branchType hopf_curve or fold_curve and correct param naming.
- UI exposes point actions with appropriate validation/error states.

title: Move system settings to inspector/systems and fix inspector defaults
description: Remove system settings button from objects tree, add edit action in Systems dialog, ensure inspector opens for system view and selection, and guard missing render defaults.
close_reason: Moved system settings access to Systems dialog/Inspector tab, ensured inspector opens for system view/selection, and hardened node render defaults; tests: npm run test:unit.

title: Web UI: equilibrium continuation (branch creation + point continuation + progress bar)
description: Implement equilibrium continuation in the web UI, including creation from equilibrium objects and from branch points, plus progress bar updates and branch detail inspector view when a branch is selected.
acceptance_criteria:
- Equilibrium continuation can be launched from an equilibrium object with full CLI settings.
- Branches appear under the parent object in the tree and are inspectable in the Selection inspector.
- Branch point continuation supports switching parameters and uses the selected point state.
- Progress bar updates in the toolbar during continuation runs.
close_reason: Implemented equilibrium continuation UI flow, branch inspection/continuation, and toolbar progress bar.

title: Fix existing web lint/build errors
description: npm run lint fails on react-hooks setState-in-effect warnings (App.tsx, PlotlyViewport.tsx), no-explicit-any in jobQueue/types/wasm/plotly, and e2e regex escapes. npm run build fails with TS errors in updateObject union narrowing (system/model.ts) and Plotly scene layout typing (ViewportPanel.tsx).
close_reason: Closed via update

title: Web UI: enforce CLI-safe object/branch names
description: Ensure object-menu entries use CLI-safe naming (alphanumeric + underscores) and update default branch/object name suggestions to avoid spaces.
close_reason: Implemented CLI-safe naming defaults and validation for web object/branch names.

title: Clean up remaining react-hooks/exhaustive-deps warnings in InspectorDetailsPanel
description: Lint still reports react-hooks/exhaustive-deps warnings in InspectorDetailsPanel.tsx (missing deps and memo warnings). Evaluate and adjust dependencies or refactors to silence warnings without changing behavior.
close_reason: Closed via update

title: Web UI: refresh systems menu after system rename
description: Ensure system list reflects updated system name after edits in the web UI.
close_reason: Fixed: system rename now updates top-level name so system list reflects new name.

title: Deduplicate inspector settings UI and normalize nodes
description: Remove duplicate system settings control in inspector header and normalize object/branch nodes during load for consistent selection.
close_reason: Removed duplicate inspector settings control and normalized object/branch nodes; tests: npm run test:unit, npm run test:e2e.

title: Persist per-system UI state
description: Store UI layout/render/order/viewport sizing per system in OPFS, separate from computational data, and include UI in export/import bundles.
close_reason: Closed

title: Fix inspector selection/system settings UX
description: Normalize UI layout defaults, open inspector for selection/system views, add inspector System Settings action, and cover in Playwright.
close_reason: Normalized UI layout defaults, ensured inspector opens on selection/system view, added inspector settings action, and validated via Playwright; tests: npm run test:e2e.

title: Rename inspector 'Selection' tab to a more semantic label
description: Once Branches tab is contextualized to the current object selection, rename the inspector 'Selection' tab to a more semantically appropriate label (e.g., Details/Inspector/Object). Update UI labels/tests accordingly.
acceptance_criteria:
- Inspector tab label is updated to the chosen semantic name.
- Related tests/data-testid references are updated.
- No behavior changes beyond labeling.
close_reason: No longer needed per request.

title: Web e2e smoke test times out waiting for system dialog
description: Playwright smoke test times out waiting for data-testid=system-name-input when running npm test in web. Likely dev server or UI not loading in e2e harness. Investigate and fix so playwright smoke passes.
notes: Investigating Playwright smoke timeout; likely port conflict causing reuseExistingServer to hit wrong app.
close_reason: Playwright e2e now allocates a free port via runner script; smoke spec reopens system tab after dialog. Tests pass via npm test.

title: Fix inspector selection view fallback for objects without nodes
description: Ensure inspector shows selection details even if system nodes are missing and document fallback behavior.
close_reason: Added fallback selection node synthesis to show inspector details even if nodes are missing, documented with comment; tests: npm run test:unit, npm run test:e2e.

title: Web build: missing fork_wasm pkg-web artifact
description: `npm run build` in web fails if crates/fork_wasm/pkg-web/fork_wasm.js is missing. Consider documenting required wasm-pack build or automating generation.
